channel.title: [pi]Spec Help[pi]
channel.description: how doi change spec ....when i do a spec it takes off 25 , i want it to take off 100

item.title: [pi]Spec Help[pi]
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

ummm im not sure of this but i hope its right check it anyways.

First search for :

c.specAmount -= 2.5;

Then you will see something like that above it :

case 1434: case 13756:

One of the cases should have the weapon ID for example if its whip :

case 4151:

Delete the case ####, #### is the ID of the weapon u want it to take 100 spec amount.

Next search for :

c.specAmount -= 10;

and between the cases right above it add

case ####:

The #### is the ID of the weapon u deleted earlier.

Save, Compile and Run server.
This should work… If not please reply i will try helping

Read full topic
